f0930aa1512a408635d2286c01d49523b1234db7.commit.message:
Remove ObjectUtils' trailing white spaces

Commit 6ea2fc8 inadvertently introduced trailing white spaces in
ObjectUtils' code, thus breaking the Checkstyle validation.

This patch removes these redundant TWS in order to allow the build to
pass.
f0930aa1512a408635d2286c01d49523b1234db7.commit.author.name: Allon Mureinik

6ea2fc8d38e035bafaa92c7d3b007be38c2e9000.commit.message:
[LANG-1360] Add methods to ObjectUtils to get various forms of class
names in a null-safe manner
6ea2fc8d38e035bafaa92c7d3b007be38c2e9000.commit.author.name: Gary Gregory

1f0dfc31b51a445eb2cfbee5321800cf51e10b67.commit.message: Always use static imports for assertion methods to be consistent with other tests classes.
1f0dfc31b51a445eb2cfbee5321800cf51e10b67.commit.author.name: pascalschumacher

713c77ceda21d0c3cc9c213341259d64fb46fdc7.commit.message:
